answers.answer: Lol. I have my 1hr on the 19th. I asked my doc if we could speed the process along by skipping the first one and going right to the 2nd one. I have such a sweet tooth with this one and had gd with my twins. She just laughed and said "you never know. Each one is different". Sigh. Not looking forward to mine either.
Good luck girls... Yes, it's awful and annoying... Sigh...

question: I failed my glucose now have to go take my 2 hour tmw it *****. Idk why they juss CNT prescribe me medicine and get over with it. I had gestational diabetes  with my other son so you figured with one testing of failing they'll prescribe. Dreading the test
title: fail glucose test
